cpb_vouchers_get_error: Oops. We're unable to display list of vouchers.
cpb_vouchers_credit_comment: Cloud credit is not transferable or refundable. It has no monetary value and any credit not used within 13 months will be lost.
cpb_vouchers_add_explain_bis: Each time an invoice is issued, the amount due is debited from your Cloud credit (below), then from your Digital Launch Pad account, and finally from your loyalty account. Any remaining debit balance is then paid using your saved payment method (details on these three payment methods are available in the “Billing” section of the OVHcloud Control Panel).
cpb_vouchers_add_error: Oops. We are unable to add this voucher. Please try again.
cpb_vouchers_add_credit_info: Select the total (ex. VAT) you would like to credit for this project. Once the purchase order has been settled, this credit will be used for bills and project usage invoiced over the following 12 months.
cpb_vouchers_add_credit_success: The purchase order for your {{ amount }} credit is available here.
cpb_vouchers_add_credit_load_err: Oops! An error has occurred loading the cloud credit purchase.
common_field_error_number: Please enter a valid numerical value.
common_field_error_min: Please enter a value greater than or equal to {{min}}.
